CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CommentTypes.​Tag
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​IDObjects.​Base
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CommentTypes.​Tag

A class encompassing a comment type tag.

Types
TagFlags
protected enum TagFlags : byte
InSystemFile

Set if the tag was defined in the system config file Comments.txt.

InProjectFile

Set if the tag was defined in the project config file Comments.txt.

InConfigFiles

A combination of InSystemFile and InProjectFile used for testing if either are set.

InBinaryFile

Set if the comment type appears in Comments.nd.

Functions
Tag
public Tag (
string newName
)
FixNameCapitalization
public void FixNameCapitalization (
string newName
)

Replaces Name with a version with alternate capitalization but is otherwise equal.  This expects the tag to be retrievable by CommentTypes.Manager.TagFromName() so it can verify that the new name won't cause any problems.

Properties
Name
override public string Name { get }
Flags

These do not affect equality.

InSystemFile
public bool InSystemFile { get; set }

Whether this tag was defined in the system Comments.txt file.

InProjectFile
public bool InProjectFile { get; set }

Whether this tag was defined in the project Comments.txt file.

InConfigFiles
public bool InConfigFiles { get }

Whether this tag was defined in either of the Comments.txt files.

InBinaryFile
public bool InBinaryFile { get; set }

Whether this tag appears in Comments.nd.

Operators
operator ==
public static bool operator == (
Tag tag1,
Tag tag2
)

Returns whether all the properties of the two tags are equal, including Name and ID, but excluding flags.

operator !=
public static bool operator != (
Tag tag1,
Tag tag2
)

Returns if any of the properties of the two tags are inequal, including Name and ID, but excluding flags.
